room

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • room.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This Room class takes dimensions of the room from the user and returns the total paintable area of the room.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getExtraArea()
      This getExtraArea function returns the non-paintable area.
      double getPaintableArea()
      This getPaintableArea function returns the total area of a room that can be painted.
      double getTotalArea()
      This getTotalArea function returns the Total area of a room.
      void setDimensions()
      This setDimensions function sets the dimensions of a room.
      void setExtraArea()
      This setExtraArea function calculates the non-paintable area for a room.
      double setPaintableArea(double totalArea, double extraArea)
      This setPaintableArea function calculates the total paintable area after subtracting the extra area i.e the area that cannot be painted(e.g doors and windows).
      void setTotalArea(double roomLength, double roomBreadth, double roomHeight)
      This setTotalArea function calculates the total area of the room that can be considered for painting i.e 4 walls and ceiling.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void setTotalArea(double roomLength,
                double roomBreadth,
                double roomHeight)
        This setTotalArea function calculates the total area of the room that can be considered for painting i.e 4 walls and ceiling.

        roomBreadth -

        Returns:

      • setPaintableArea

        public double setPaintableArea(double totalArea,
                      double extraArea)
        This setPaintableArea function calculates the total paintable area after subtracting the extra area i.e the area that cannot be painted(e.g doors and windows).
        Parameters:
        totalArea -
        extraArea -
        Returns:
        (totalArea - extraArea)

      • getPaintableArea

        public double getPaintableArea()
        This getPaintableArea function returns the total area of a room that can be painted.
        Returns:
        paintableArea
